name: Biomarker Selection 1
description: This pipeline performs biomarker selection on time series bulk RNAseq data. Only run this in demo mode.

queue.description: This step designed the plan. It is placed in the queue because we needed a place holder for 0 indexed lists.

queue.prompt: /force CODE select the 2015 gene expression dataset
queue.description: This step is used to load the correct dataset to BRADs output directory

queue.prompt: /force CODE convert the dataset to gene coordinates
queue.description: This step prepares the data for modeling a sensor selection codes

queue.prompt: /force CODE build a linear model of the data
queue.description: This step builds a LTI difference equation model of the data

queue.prompt: /force CODE perform time invariant biomarker selection on the model from S3 to find the best biomarkers for all time points
/force DATABSE look up genes identied during S4 under the States column of the biomarker process using Enrichr.
queue.description: This step performs gene enrichment on the selected biomarkers.
